Greetings,dear "DEAD BY DAYLIGHT" Official, I would appreciate if you could read my words. I was about to negotiate with you in the way of "whisper" function of bilibili. However it seems that you don't accept private messages, and you had offered me with a website for help, which is totally useless. So, it seems that you don't respect me, i choose to negotiate in public.
When i heard about the repair of "delay hit" ,which completely ruined the whole game,in bilibili,i don't believe it at first. But i'm desperate after the experience of the afternoon of July 29th. As a killer ranked in 3, i successfully fell back in 5, the humans keep taunting me in the board as if they are the killers. When i hit them with my weapon, i saw the blood and heard their scream,but when i looked at the left of my screen, nothing happened. Then i open the menu, i saw the "27ms". I just don' understand, is that a high ping? Though there's still some guys saying the "delay hit" still exists, i can't find it during my 3 hours' playing tour.Of course, i did use the VPN, so i turned it off and tried the local server, useless! You may say my router is of high ping and i can guarantee that i have just changed my router in 2020. Anyway, i experience this afternoon with the taunting of the humans as the BGM.
 Some guys may say the killers are strong enough, but as the Wraith was weakened, the killers are beginning to fall. You said you have strengthened He zhiyun, so the players who acted as the Fiend just like me are not supposed to exist?
You've made a bad decision, i'm disappointed with you, i don't wish you guys to change it back to the old versions, but i do wish you can stand out and give us a proper reason.
Thanks.
